name: LiveCam + Timelapse for WordPress and Android
author: vicbusiness.com

sections.description:
Add a tag for a livecam image from your android phone. A timelapse video of the last 12 hours is also generated.
Add them to your pages and posts. Usage: [vicbusiness_livecam code=’12345′] will display latest image. [vicbusiness_timelapse code=’12345′]
will display last 12 hours of timelapse video. The code must be obtained from your android phone.
Find your unique code at the bottom of the screen on your phone while running the application.
Download Android application from https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=vicbusiness.com

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
1. Extract livecam.vicbusiness.com.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Add instant webcam + timelapse video from your android to a page or post using short tags.
